price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ronú pìwàdà lẹ́yìn àbòsí (ọwọ́) rẹ̀, tí ó sì ṣe àtúnṣe, dájúdájú Allāhu yóò gba ìronúpìwàdà rẹ̀. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Aláforíjìn, Aláàánú.
arabic: فَمَن تَابَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِ ظُلۡمِهِۦ وَأَصۡلَحَ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَتُوبُ عَلَيۡهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ غَفُورٞ رَّحِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: faman tāba min baʿdi ẓul'mihi wa-aṣlaḥa fa-inna al-laha yatūbu ʿalayhi inna al-laha ghafūrun raḥīmun
